title: Rugby-Wales team to face France
text: March 15, 2018 / 12:08 PM / Updated an hour ago Rugby-Wales team to face France Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 15 (Reuters) - Wales coach Warren Gatland has named the following team to play France in Cardiff on Saturday in the Six Nations: 15-Leigh Halfpenny, 14-George North, 13-Scott Williams, 12-Hadleigh Parkes, 11-Liam Williams, 10-Dan Biggar, 9-Gareth Davies, 8-Taulupe Faletau, 7-Josh Navidi, 6-Justin Tipuric, 5-Alun Wyn Jones (captain), 4-Cory Hill, 3-Tomas Francis, 2-Ken Owens, 1-Rob Evans Replacements: 16-Elliot Dee, 17-Nicky Smith, 18-Samson Lee, 19-Bradley Davies, 20-Aaron Shingler, 21-Aled Davies, 22-Gareth Anscombe, 23-Steff Evans. (Reporting by Nick Said Editing by David Goodman)
